::Battera::

She heard the voice on her commlink and responded.
"I'm flying at the moment. Who are you?" She normaly wasn't 
sarcastic, but some reason, she couldn't resist this one time.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Quickstrike's crimson eyes glowed cold with that signature. It 
could be one 
> of Hell Beast's troops. That made him a little nervous. "Yeah," he 
replied 
> to Dark Mouse. "But let's try somethin' first. He opened up his 
comm-link to 
> the signature and spoke, "This is sub-commander Quickstrike, who in 
> tarnation are you?"
